import './App.css'; import Home from './components/Home'; import Login from './components/Login'; import Dashboard from './components/Dashboard'; import { BrowserRouter, Routes, Route } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; function App() { const data = [ {name: 'Ali', password: 'abc'}, {name: 'Maryna', password: 'ijk'}, {name: 'Vasya', password: 'xyz'}, ] const [user, setUser] = useState() const [users, setUsers] = useState(data) function login(e){ e.preventDefault() // console.log(e.target.username.value) let u = e.target.username.value let p = e.target.username.value let foundUser = users.find(i=> i.name =user) if(!foundUser){ return } if(foundUser.password==p){ } } return (
